Specimen Type: Plasma (lithium heparin or SST) and 24-hour timed urine
Purpose: To assess kidney function by calculating creatinine clearance using paired plasma and timed urine creatinine concentrations.
Container: Lithium heparin or SST tube for plasma; 24-hour urine collection container for urine
Equipment: Automated chemistry analyzer (e.g., Roche or Beckman)
